name: Piazza Realty Property Management Inc
address: 120 E George Hopper Rd #112, Burlington, WA 98233

google_reviews.author: S. S
google_reviews.review:
Beware to renters. Theyll charge you for every light bulb and piece of lint upon move out.
Beware owners. The quality of maintenance is horrific. You put your house in their hands and expect them to maintain, but if they actually fix anything, its done by questionable people that dont seem to know what theyre doing. Instead of removing rot, lets just throw some toothpaste over it and call it a day. Extremely disappointed

google_reviews.author: N La
google_reviews.review: Theres a lot of negative comments about piazza. My totally experience has been a blessing, last minute showing for me, communication is on point! They are doing everything in their power to get me into a place. Breanna has been so helpful and supportive with my stress case self the rest of the staff have been wonderful! Sometimes we write bad reviews because we didnt get the answer we wanted. Some stuff isnt in their control FYI they still have to follow through with the owners of the property and their demands. Dont hesitate to give them a call. 10 starts from me! Thank you Breanna and team for all your hard work!

owner_response.text: Gosh!!! Thank you Nicole, it is our pleasure to help and to work with you on your rental. The review is a huge  bonus, cant wait to share with the staff.

google_reviews.author: Danial Osburn
google_reviews.review:
Okay so Im amongst friends talking about our experiences with piazza reality. Which triggered me to remember I never got to give my review. I lived at
13075 Avon Allen rd
Unit b
mount Vernon wa
98273
This property has since been sold and hopefully taken from there control as property managers. They were the worst landlords ever upon move in the unit was  unclean and covered in animal hair. And had a very strong Oder. I reported this. At least tried to, I took and provided pictures. Because they say that its mandatory they take some of the deposit for rug cleaning they clearly didnt clean it. I felt as if I deserved to not be charged that. Well they still screwed me out of it. Then also any time something happened they never even attempted to fix it for weeks. Leaving me to do it. Which is fine if I was compensated for things they were responsible for. The grass. There was lawn mower on site and I wasnt given access to mow the lawn and it sat until it was over a foot and a half. Any ways. Honestly. Terrible out fit not honest. And they dont care

google_reviews.author: Leslie Martinez
google_reviews.review:
By far the worst company to try and rent from. They take their sweet time processing everything. Everytime you try calling to speak to the management person or whatever they are  busy or dont answer the phone. After they finally  approve you they want a double deposit ? A DOUBLE deposit for a place that looks like they havent fixed the kitchen since 1990?! They dont tell you when a place isnt available anymore until you ask and still are waiting on them to do their job and process your stuff. The office people arent the most welcoming either I saw the receptionist talking on the phone with a tenant and rolling her eyes !! I feel like they discriminated us since the other applicant I was applying with is Hispanic with an ITIN but yet we make 7X the rent together ? Thats crazy.
Anyways goodluck if you apply with them.

google_reviews.author: Cassandra Rauch
google_reviews.review: I've been renting my home through this company for over three years now, and I feel like I've had a rather great experience. They have been responsive when I've needed assistance or information, and they have always been really pleasant to work with. It did take a little bit of time to get a new lease agreement drafted up, and we experienced a mix up in what our rent amount would be due to a clerical error, but that is a small drop in the bucket when compared to the rest of my experiences with them. I really don't have anything to complain about! I've been consistently thankful for my home!

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Cassandra! We appreciate you so much!

google_reviews.author: Mike Lowrey
google_reviews.review:
I didnt have the best credit history. The staff and Manager were super willing and enthusiast about helping me. They made me feel comfortable and not like less than a person. They gave me the opportunity to have something better newer and nice for my family. Unlike other realty companies in the area that are rude and treat you poorly. By FAR, the best rental application process I have ever experienced. The Manager and her team are above and beyond outstanding customer service. Cant say enough how happy and blessed I feel to have been introduced to This company.

UPDATE: 9/4/19
I Recently completed the move out process after finishing my lease. And this was just as customer friendly as amazing when I first moved in and went through the application process. In fact, I am only moving because I am relocating, otherwise I would still be there. Kathy is amazing and did everything she could to accommodate me. I a really appreciate. Being a tenant with Piazza and will be referring everyone I know.

-Nick

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Mike. We really appreciate you taking the time for this detailed review it means so much to our staff.

google_reviews.author: SwC R
google_reviews.review:
This place is awful to deal with if you are renting from them. I know numerous ppl that have been screwed by this company. They are a dishonest company. Rented me a home with non stop problems. Sinks not working, rat problems, heating issues along with a huge pile outside of previous tenants garbage that was never dealt with. You can contact them non stop about issues but they don't respond nor care. Said they could send out a maintenance man but after
3 months waiting I gave up. I took pictures of rats garbage and everything. After moving out, they sent me to collections claiming  I owed for cleaning garbage ect for 1800. Lol Messed up my credit now I will fight them in court. This company is not new to the courts. They all know Piazza and everyone knows they are dishonest and not worth the headache to ever rent from. Wish I knew it earlier.

owner_response.text:
Dear SwC r
We do not recognize our name as ever having rented from us.  If you have concerns with Move-out charges, we certainly want you to talk with us and provide us with the photos you say you took.  Please call our office, and let us address this.  We don't rent out properties with other people's trash left behind.  We are very disappointed that we can't speak to this with the information provided.  If you are sharing this information on someone else's behalf, please have them call us.  We take all reviews and feedback very seriously.
Sincerely Kathy Jo Piazza

google_reviews.author: Debbie Joswick
google_reviews.review:
I've been renting from Piazza Realty for over 5-years now and they have been an excellent company to work with. Quick to address any issues we may have and in a timely fashion. Kathy is wonderful, as is her staff!

Can't say enough good things about this company. Give them a try!

owner_response.text: Thank you, Debbie.   We can't tell how much it means to us to get this kind of review from a long term renter.  We appreciate this very much, from the whole staff.

google_reviews.author: Zack K
google_reviews.review:
Kathy Piazza Property Management has been my property manager since 2009 when I had left due to military orders up to the sale of my home in December 2016.  I have not had a problem with them.  They are very professional in everything they do.

They only charge a small percentage of my rental income which is good because if I don't get rent then they don't get paid.  This is a very fair process unlike some other property managers that charge a fee regardless if it's rented or not.  They routinely checked on my property and made sure it was still in good shape.  I have not had any issues with any tenants over the 8 years it was rented.  If there were any issues with maintenance, they made sure it was taken care of and if it was an expensive fix, they always got my permission first to fix it.

After I had listed my house for sale, they continued to work with my relator and I to make sure the property was good to go until the sale went through smoothly, even though they were not obligated to do so.  They went above and beyond their normal duties of a property manager.

owner_response.text: Thank you Zack.  We appreciate your review and hope you are doing well. Thank you for your service.

google_reviews.author: AJ wilson
google_reviews.review:
Very friendly and the process from before and after was amazing.
Highly recommend.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much AJ!  We are looking forward to sharing this with the whole team. We appreciate your business and your recommendation!

google_reviews.author: ryan biggers
google_reviews.review: Got screwed out of money on a background check. Was told I was the fisrt and only one to put in for a rental and then after a month of dodging my calls they emailed me to tell me some one else beat me to the application

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review but I am unsure as to why you are leaving a review at this time when we have not done business together in 3 years.  I can not go back and tell you why your application was not approved but we do follow sticked guidelines when it comes to approval and/or denial to follow all the laws set forth in our state/county.

google_reviews.author: Joel Dominie
google_reviews.review: Maria, the front office lady who takes phone calls and attempts to help people, is rude and obnoxious - and always seems to be covering for her boss. Kathy, the "Manager," is always so busy yet she leaves early and is routinely unavailable. How this management company operates is beyond me but getting anything done with this place is absolutely ridiculous. We've been waiting for 3 days for a response and Kathy is nowhere to be found - always in "meetings" and oops we were so busy but she left early for the day. If you're so busy, why do get to leave early?? This isn't the first time either. Once my lease is up I'm leaving and I'm never coming back...

google_reviews.author: Vincent Sherman
google_reviews.review:
Piazza Realty Property management was recommended to me to.manage my rental house in Mount Vernon by a local floor service company. It was one of the best recommendations i have ever recieved.
Piazza's mangement has been very professional. They have taken good care of the house, my tenants and me. They found me good tenants, who always pay the rent and take good care of the house, and Piazza has been very responsive when maintenance issues have come up, with practical affordable solutions. Their accounting staff has tracked income and expenses very well, and mad preparation of my tax return much easier.
I highly recommend thier services.

owner_response.text: Thank you Vincent. It is our pleasure to serve your.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  It means a lot of us as a small business.

google_reviews.author: Tamie Jensen
google_reviews.review:
I contacted them to ask about an apartment listed for rent. A 1 bed/ bath. It's a duplex with laundry in garage. No yard. Front door to building is missing. The outside is covered in moss. It's in a rather shady area of Stanwood. Surrounded by businesses and some drug areas. This tiny place is asking $1200,same for deposit. The realty company was rude. For this price,Mt Vernon has 2 bdrms for the same price in better neighborhoods.
Thanks for the response. Since you didn't bother to address the moss or bother to use the correct spelling of my name,your reply means nothing. There are better price properties in Arlington/ Smokey Point even Stanwood.

owner_response.text: Greetings Tami. I know its difficult to find affordable housing right now. The rate is actually what it is for that area. We do not set the rental prices that is set by the owners. Mount Vernon is less expensive than Stanwood or Arlington.

google_reviews.author: Vicky Benson
google_reviews.review: We Are Very Pleased With Piazza Property Management July would be 9 Years Renting From Them Staff Is Wonderful To Maintenance is Prompt as well.....

owner_response.text: Vicky.  We appreciate you. Thank you for posting this.

google_reviews.author: Whitney Warsaw
google_reviews.review: Would give them zero if I could. Attitude right when they answer the phone. And apparently the main person u need to talk to.. takes her break 15 min after they open. I called 3 different times and she was 'on break' ...unprofessional...the person who showed me the house was rushing me through, and didn't even say a word while we walked through...these people hate their job and it shows. Plus idk if anyone noticed but they have employees on here rating their own business with 5 stars...bit of a conflict of interest I believe.

owner_response.text: So sorry Whitney, these processes are sometimes very dissapointing for potential renters for many reasons.  We are a property managers and can only manage for owners based on their specifications and standing rental rules.  We wish you the best of luck with your search and for you and your family.

google_reviews.author: Michelle Kerr
google_reviews.review: I love the owner and all of the employees. I felt more like a friend than rather than just a  tenant! Much love

owner_response.text: Thank you Michelle.  We feel that way too.  We appreciate you sharing that with us and others.

google_reviews.author: patti basart
google_reviews.review:
I want to thank Piazza Property Management for my wonderful experience in finding a delightful place to live, with their help.  They have been professional, helpful, kind and courteous from my application process to moving in and so responsive to questions and a tiny, tiny item that needed to be fixed -- which was followed up within 2 hours and fixed perfectly by the next day.  They've been respectful, flexible and made my moving experience wonderful.  Not to mention, I am leasing a new townhouse in burlington, with excellent construction,  wood floors, beautiful open floor plan, stunning kitchen with granite countertops, high quality cabinets and, neutral, tasteful colors and a fenced yard.  Plus, the grounds are maintained.  Usually, I like to maintain, but this is a real treat and I am thoroughly enjoying.

I recommend Piazza Realty Property Management in Burlington to anyone who is a friend.  They have been perfect--professional, helpful and delivered everything they said they would.  I am very happy.   -patti

owner_response.text: Thank you Patti, We appreciate this review!

google_reviews.author: Sean Brenton
google_reviews.review: The web site is never up to date. And sometimes doesn't even work at all. If a property has a pending application ahead of yours we should be able to be told a time frame. There is no reason every County a universal application. And data base to store and maintain up to date information. I'm saying it right here skagit County. I have my will to succeed. And my family gives me that drive . So I am going to do my best and form a bridge between owner and tenant. And make it  easier to have your property viewed. And make applications more easily accessible to owners

owner_response.text: Thank you Sean for the feedback.  We are constantly updating our technology and website.   Let us know if you have anymore trouble with the site.

google_reviews.author: Juan Jose
google_reviews.review: Great company to work with! I first started as a tenant with them and had great service, then I purchased my first rental property and put it under their management and they have done an exceptional job!  I would highly recommend this company to anyone looking to rent or to have their property managed!

owner_response.text: Thank you Juan.  We appreciate your business and your review.

google_reviews.author: Madisen Cork
google_reviews.review: Only reason it is 4 stars instead of 5 is because it can be really hard to communicate with them. They work with you with just about anything thankfully, but it can be really hard to get a call back because they always seem to be so busy! Kathy is really kind and seems like she really cares and it seems like she does a lot, and I hope she knows she's appreciated!

owner_response.text: Thank you Madisen.  We do appreciate you.

google_reviews.author: Kenneth Marty
google_reviews.review: They were great to work with and deal with.

owner_response.text: Thank you Kenneth. We appreciate your business and that you took the time to give us a compliment! It means a lot to our staff.

google_reviews.author: Angela Prevette
google_reviews.review: I am a long term renter with Piazza.  Kathy-Jo has gone above and beyond helping my family and I during trying times while renting through Piazza.  I would recommend renting through them today!

owner_response.text: Thanks Angela, I appreciate your review and 5-stars!!  Thanks for being a great tenant!!

google_reviews.author: Kenny Jans
google_reviews.review: Outstanding service from top to bottom.  Staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and very responsive.  10/10 strongly recommend!

owner_response.text: Thank you Kenny!! We appreciate you and this great review!!!

google_reviews.author: Cindy De Leon
google_reviews.review: Just started renting under Piazza Realty Property Management Inc in October and so far everything that we've taken to them has been corrected/replaced in a quick manner, with no complaints/arguments.  Very nice staff to work with.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Cindy! We appreicate you.

google_reviews.author: Danny Dean
google_reviews.review: Been with them for over a year now, we recently had a big windstorm that caused a tree to fall into our powerlines pse rold us we had to have an electrician come out and repair stuff. Called Piazza at 8am and spoke to them about it and Maria had someone out here within a couple hours to take care of it!!! Thanks for your help!!!!!!

owner_response.text: Thank you Danny, We appreciate you taking the time leave this great review. It means so much to our staff.

google_reviews.author: Larry Hilliard
google_reviews.review: I really like working with these people - Biri, Veronica, Kathy and the others working behind the scenes.  They are my "go to" team for finding tenants and executing leases. Thanks!  Larry H.

owner_response.text: Thank you Larry,  We like working with you too.  This review means a lot to all of us.

google_reviews.author: Dylan Husby
google_reviews.review: Everyone I ever know thats rented from here has absolutely hated it. Very rude, condescending staff, will fine you for complaints even if not valid. Multiple friends and family have given me this information. Do not rent from them :)

owner_response.text: Hi Dylan,  I have looked for you in our system and do not find you as a current or previous tenant.  I would love to discuss this further with you if you could reach out to me via email at kathy@piazzapropmgt.com or by phone at 360-424-7368.  Thank you.

google_reviews.author: David Torres
google_reviews.review: We have rented for 7+ years with Piazza. Local Family and business, they are good to work with and have done good by us over the years. I would recommend.

owner_response.text: Thank you David.  We so appreciate our review.

google_reviews.author: Kjersti Mutchler
google_reviews.review: This is the worst management company Ive ever rented from. Expect inspections beyond legal requirements, poor communication with very rude staff and management, unprofessional behavior, rent increases when reporting a problem with the property, and to be treated condescendingly. 0 stars......but in order to post this one star is required.

owner_response.text: Hi Kjersti, I have looked through our records and do not see you as a current or previous tenant.  If you have things that you would like to discuss I am more than happy to meet with you.

google_reviews.author: Brenda Porter
google_reviews.review: Worst place I have ever rented from. They were never true to their word. Most dysfunctional employees. All were useless my entire time living in my rental. Never again will I rent from them.

owner_response.text: We are so sorry that you felt that way. Being in the middle between owners and renters is not an easy place but we do the VERY best we can for both. Sometimes there are irreconcilable differences in the relationships between owner and renters. We understand that. We try to carry out our responsibilities to owners as close to letter as we can. We advise owners of situations and recommend solutions. Sometimes it just doesn't work out. In the end, we have to respect the requests of the property owner and follow the letter of law when it comes to rental agreements. Sometimes people being unhappy with us is the price we pay for Property Management. Thank you for your feedback. We take this very seriously. We are evaluating carefully to be sure there are not some areas of opportunity for improvement for us as well.We wish you the best.

google_reviews.author: Joe
google_reviews.review: Dishonest in the way they do business and known as slum landlords in Skagit. Id stay away and look elsewhere! Not worth it

google_reviews.author: A A
google_reviews.review: I have rented from Kathy for 5 years and I would like to say that she is honest, respectful and truly cares about you!

owner_response.text: We appreciate your review so much. We do try hard to care for everyone.  We appreciate you!

google_reviews.author: Jason BENSON
google_reviews.review: We have been renting our town house thru piazza for close to three years now.  Any unexpected issues have always been resolved quickly and to our satisfaction.

owner_response.text: Thanks Jason, it's  been our pleasure working with you!!!

google_reviews.author: David Torretta
google_reviews.review: This agencyIs absolutely awesomeIs absolutely awesome.I have five properties with themAnd they have totally been on top of things.

owner_response.text: Thank you David, your confidence is much appreciate by the whole staff.

google_reviews.author: Noirceuil LeSombre
google_reviews.review: Great staff. Very open and efficient. Friendly and helpful. Viewing and application process smooth.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much we appreciate your feedback.

google_reviews.author: Johnna Rodriguez
google_reviews.review: Horrible! The owner Paul is more respectful and really cares! Not like the manager Kathy! And all her office worker! They have bad customer service!

owner_response.text: We are so sorry that you felt that way. Being in the middle between owners and renters is not an easy place but we do the VERY best we can for both. Sometimes there are irreconcilable differences in the relationships between owner and renters. We understand that. We try to carry out our responsibilities to owners as close to letter as we can. We advise owners of situations and recommend solutions. Sometimes it just doesn't work out. In the end, we have to respect the requests of the property owner and follow the letter of law when it comes to rental agreements. Sometimes people being unhappy with us is the price we pay for Property Management. Thank you for your feedback. We take this very seriously. We are evaluating carefully to be sure there are not some areas of opportunity for improvement for us as well.We wish you the best.

google_reviews.author: Loretta Cantu
google_reviews.review: I have enjoyed renting from them. They are friendly and when I need something fixed they get it done.

owner_response.text: Thank you Loretta.  We really appreciate you.

google_reviews.author: Holly Woodhams
google_reviews.review: I would give them five stars if they had more properties available.  Especially outside of Mount Vernon.

owner_response.text: Thank you Holly, we appreciate your feedback, keep checking with us as we do get new properties in quite often.

google_reviews.author: Jay Bulworth
google_reviews.review: She was rude. Very unpleasant to deal with over all and we chose to not even peruse business with them because of it.

google_reviews.author: Doug
google_reviews.review: In agreement with the other reviewer, I would have an attorney review any contract with this company before agreeing to lease one of their properties.

owner_response.text: Contracts should always be reviewed carefully and make sure that you know what you are signing.  We unfortunately are managers and not owners so it is the nature of our business to have to please our owners. We strive to help everyone but are not able to that.

google_reviews.author: Ezra Epstein
google_reviews.review: They're a great property management team.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Ezra!!! This means a ton to all of us.

google_reviews.author: Autumn Cameron
google_reviews.review: Professional and friendly staff, will recommend to anyone I know looking for a clean and well managed property

owner_response.text: Thank you Autumn. We really appreciate you.

google_reviews.author: Aaronations Animations and Art
google_reviews.review: Left mold in the house and spat in our faces 0/10 awful

owner_response.text: Hi Aaron, I've tried to find you in our system to review your account and was unable to locate your file. We have very few staff that interacts directly with our clients.  None of us would have spat on anyone.  This is a very untrue and unkind accusation.  If you would like to discuss issues with Piazza Realty Property Management please call Kathy at 360-424-7368 and let us know what name was on the rental agreement.  Thank you and Merry Christmas!!

google_reviews.author: Adam Griffin
google_reviews.review: Great to do business with. Very friendly and honest.

owner_response.text:
Thank you Adam,
We appreciate this review very much.

google_reviews.author: Barbara Riley
google_reviews.review: They are very friendly and helpful as can be!

owner_response.text: Thank you Barbara!

google_reviews.author: Kevin Tinoco-Chavez
google_reviews.review: Really nice and clean good assistants

owner_response.text: Thank you Kevin. Accrue really appreciate you taking the time for the review. That means a lot to us.

google_reviews.author: Renee Bradwell
google_reviews.review: Not great property management.

owner_response.text: We are so sorry Renee.  We are a property managers and not owners.  We can only be an ambassador for the property owners.  We want to help everyone but unfortunatley we can't always do that.  Best of luck to you and your family.

google_reviews.author: Dianna Blankenship
google_reviews.review: Great staff.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Diana. We really apprecaite you taking the time to share this great review.

google_reviews.author: Aj Howard
google_reviews.review: Good place to rent from

owner_response.text: Thank you AJ,  If you need anything let us know.

google_reviews.author: Stephen Murphy
google_reviews.review: Good place to rent from

owner_response.text: Thank you Stephen, We very much appreciate the review.

google_reviews.author: Nathyeli Santiago
google_reviews.review: The attention in the office is very pleasant

owner_response.text: Thanks for your review.  We appreciate it very much!
Thank you Kim, it has been our pleasure working with you for the last 15 years!
Thank you Tony,  our whole staff appreciates your review.  You made our day.
Thank you.

Our family has been in the property management business all my life.  We are always disappointed when owners and tenants clash over repairs, rules, property upkeep, community areas, owner responsibilities, or tenant accountability during the term of the rental.   As the property manager, we find ourselves sometimes in the unhappy position of delivering unpleasant news and owner expectations to tenants.  We wish your experience and the owner's experience with your tenantship was more amiable.  All we can do is do the best job we can for both our owners and our tenants.  We strive for both daily.   We wish you the best in your future.

Hi Loni, Thank you for your feedback.  It is clear you were disapointed but we don't know the reason. Please reach out to us for feedback.  As property managers , we are not owners and do our best to please both tenants and owners.  Best of luck to you.
Thank you
Sorry for your experience.  Please contact our office and let us know how we could have done better.

summary.text:
Good

This article highlights how Piazza Realty Property Management Inc. has been recognized for its efficient services and dedicated team members. Numerous user reviews commend the staff for their professionalism, mentioning that even less-than-perfect credit histories were accommodated with understanding and support. Piazza's ability to provide prompt resolution to maintenance concerns is consistently praised, with users expressing their gratitude for the timely interventions during emergencies such as power restorations after a storm. It's clear from the feedback that both property owners and tenants see the team as responsive and courteous, especially in cases where the firm has had to mediate between the two parties to ensure mutual satisfaction in complex situations.

Additionally, several long-term tenants speak highly of their experiences, noting that Piazza Realty fosters a congenial relationship with renters. For instance, multiple reviews highlight individuals like Kathy and Breanna for their dedication and the warm customer service they provide, which leaves customers feeling valued and respected. The company is also appreciated for its flexible and smooth application process, which many users note as a stress-free experience, setting Piazza Realty apart from other more rigid property management companies.

Great

A standout point in the article is Piazza Realty's dedication to creating a seamless rental experience for both tenants and property owners. User reviews commend the company for going above and beyond, especially in their handling of maintenance tasks swiftly and effectively. An example of this is a tenant who praised Piazza Realty for having repairs completed within hours of reporting a fallen tree impacting the power lines, highlighting the company's commitment to safety and comfort. These experiences reflect the company’s capability to manage properties efficiently even under less-than-ideal circumstances.

Moreover, property owners also express satisfaction in how their investments are handled by Piazza Realty, underlining the management's proactive approach to upkeep and tenant relations. One owner noted that the managerial team at Piazza keeps them well-informed about property conditions and potential repairs, giving landlords peace of mind that their properties are in capable hands. The consensus among positive reviews seems to be that Piazza Realty prioritizes a customer-first ethos, ensuring that issues are flagged and resolved without unnecessary delay, which not only safeguards property value but also maintains tenant satisfaction.

Bad

In contrast to the positives, the article also covers a number of unfavorable experiences encountered by clients of Piazza Realty Property Management Inc., primarily revolving around communication issues. Some tenants have reported a lack of responsiveness from the staff, with critical maintenance requests going unheeded for extended durations, leading to frustration and inconvenience. An illustrative case involves a tenant who faced persistent issues like faulty sinks and an unresolved rat infestation, which remained unaddressed for over three months despite repeated communications.

In addition to maintenance delays, several users have pointed out the administrative and procedural hurdles they faced during their interactions with Piazza Realty. Concerns were raised about the necessity for a double deposit and the perceived antiquity of some rental properties. Moreover, dissatisfaction was noted regarding the company's slow processing of applications, leaving potential tenants in an uncertain waiting period. These incidents suggest that while the company excels in certain areas, there are notable lapses that have left some clients considering alternative property management options.

Ugly

The article acknowledges some of the more severe criticisms faced by Piazza Realty Property Management Inc., especially those highlighting what users perceive as unethical practices and poor treatment. Several user reviews have expressed anger over unreturned security deposits and cited instances where the company reportedly levied unwarranted charges for damages or services not rendered, including in cases where premises were left unclean at move-in. An account details how a tenant was sent to collections for disputed cleaning fees upon vacating a property, calling into question the company’s professionalism.

Efforts to address disputes have also not been perceived positively by all users, as some report dismissive or condescending customer service experiences. Reviews highlight feeling discriminated against or treated unfairly, such as in a scenario where a prospective tenant felt sidelined possibly due to racial bias despite presenting a strong financial profile. This perception of partiality, coupled with inconsistent response times from management, has fueled a damaged reputation in certain circles, leading to suggestions for potential renters and landlords to proceed with caution when engaging with Piazza Realty. These experiences serve as critical areas for reflection and improvement for the company to restore trust and transparency in their business dealings.
